sheet.name: en
sheet.text: Choose the BGM for Boosts in Cyber Space
Sonic's stats will depend on which save data is loaded.
Select game clear data to begin a New Game+ with previous stats and skills carried over
Delete the record for this Challenge
Adjust the volume for different sound settings
This style is recommended for people who are used to playing Sonic games.
This will not save the game clear data. Proceed?
Only game clear data can be used to create a New Game+
Set the bounce height for uneven terrain
Some changes will not be reflected in some situations
Turn the item display (Rings, Keys, etc.) ON/OFF
This style is recommended for people who are used to Sonic gameplay.
Set whether Auto Combo activates skills during combos
Set whether to train while waiting or after game over
Do you want to apply the changes?
Set whether the camera will use dramatic angles when skills are used during battles
Set whether the camera will reset its position in certain places of the game
Choose a setting for local reflection
Set the vertical camera to Normal/Invert
Set the horizontal camera to Normal/Invert
Set whether to automatically return to the starting point when the Action Chain Challenge ends
Choose how the game will be displayed
Set the top speed (adjustments may not reflect upgrades)
In Photo Mode, the game will be paused and the camera will be freely movable
Recommended for those who want to focus more on the story.
This style is recommended for people who are not familiar with Sonic gameplay.
Restart Battle Rush from the beginning
Exit the stage and return to the field
Training while waiting or after a game over
Adjust various settings for the game
This style is recommended for people who are not familiar with Sonic games.
Settings related to graphics and performance
Quit trial and return to the field
Turn the skill points display ON/OFF
Set the camera sensitivity when using a controller
This mode is for battle-hardened veterans. Taking a single hit will mean game over. *Game difficulty cannot be changed partway
Set whether to see notifications while exploring the islands
Select language for text and voice
Close the menu and return to the game
Choose which monitor will display the game
Quitting Action Chain Challenge from current position
Recommended for those who want challenging battles and something extra.
Cyclone Boost Controls for Ascending and Descending
Restart Cyber Space Challenge from the beginning
Set whether to train during a loading screen or after game over
In this game, you can choose the difficulty level of battles. You can also change the difficulty level during gameplay.
You can select the settings that fit your style of play. These can be changed in more detail at any time during the game in Options.
Set whether the camera will automatically turn in the direction Sonic travels to
Set whether to replay the Power Boost Scene
Reverse the controls for ascending and descending during a Cyclone Boost (only usable with Tails)
Choose a batch setting for graphics quality
Quit Battle Rush and return to the previous menu
Exit the stage and return to the selection menu
When the Juke Box is ON, the playback settings can be changed
Start over from the beginning of the Quest
Set whether the Slot Machine activates when a starfall occurs
Set whether Sonic can move when commenting on his surroundings
Save/load game data or return to the title screen
Quit Cyber Space Challenge and return to the previous menu
Load save data and restore previous state
Choose a setting for volumetric lighting
Exit the Quest and return to the field
Set the deceleration rate for jumps (This will also apply to Cyber Space)
You can choose to train while waiting
You can choose to train while loading
Please see the following URL for the Sonic Frontiers web manual:
If you are using a smartphone or tablet, please use the QR code.
Turn the center cursor display ON/OFF
Set the camera sensitivity when using a mouse
Progress for "Another Story" content can only be saved to save slots for "Another Story". Please select a save slot.
Set whether to maintain a boost during a jump
Set the HD rumble feature ON/OFF
Recommended for those who want a balance between story and challenging foes.
Delete the record for this Stage
Set the deceleration rate to reach a complete stop
Adjust the overall volume of the game
Set whether to enable Power Boost in Cyber Space
